chunks.zh: 在杭州写代码，买不起房子 很迷茫
chunks.en: Writing code in Hangzhou, can't afford a house, very confused.

chunks.zh: 感觉赚钱好少 盘算了一下除了开销 一年才存了 7w
chunks.en: Feels like I'm not earning enough. After calculating, I only saved 70,000 RMB a year after expenses.

chunks.zh: 目前 25 在杭写 java 很迷茫 买不起房子
chunks.en: Currently 25, writing Java in Hangzhou, very confused, can't afford a house.

chunks.zh: 没房没车没对象  也不知道未来该咋走
chunks.en: No house, no car, no partner, and don't know where to go in the future.

chunks.zh: 能做的事很多1.上小红书，发帖“听劝”，让人指导改变形象，强身健体，学习穿衣打扮2.学理财，多看书《富爸爸穷爸爸》《定投十年财务自由》，关注股市，抓住周期的机会3.断舍离，极简生活，需要的东西买好的，不需要的东西不买4.学习两性社交知识，提高自己的情绪价值，不要在给你介绍对象时连话都不谈5.最重要的强化专业技能，换工资更高的工作不要经常想着追求最终买房结婚，先追求生活更舒适和财富更多，机会在不经意时可能就到了
chunks.en: There are many things you can do: 1. Go on Xiaohongshu, post 'seeking advice', ask people to guide you to change your image, strengthen your body, learn how to dress. 2. Learn about financial management, read more books like 'Rich Dad Poor Dad' and 'Invest for Ten Years to Achieve Financial Freedom', pay attention to the stock market, and seize cyclical opportunities. 3. Declutter, live a minimalist lifestyle, buy good things when needed, and don't buy things you don't need. 4. Learn about interpersonal and social skills, improve your emotional intelligence, and don't be silent when introduced to potential partners. 5. Most importantly, strengthen your professional skills and find a higher-paying job. Don't always think about eventually buying a house and getting married, first pursue a more comfortable life and more wealth, opportunities may come unexpectedly.

chunks.zh: 你才 25 ，如花似玉的年龄，就要被这些东西绑住看来，房地产还得大涨！
chunks.en: You are only 25, a beautiful age, and you are already being tied down by these things, it seems that real estate prices will have to rise sharply!

chunks.zh: 25 的时候我一年存 10w ，后来谈了女朋友，一年只能存 5w 了
chunks.en: When I was 25, I saved 100,000 RMB a year, but after I got a girlfriend, I could only save 50,000 RMB a year.

chunks.zh: 2023 年你存了 7 万元，打败了 13 亿 9300 万人，超过全国 99.5%的人，成为全国 2023 年存款榜前 0.005%，继续加油，你的前方只剩 700 万人。
chunks.en: In 2023, you saved 70,000 RMB, defeating 1.393 billion people, surpassing 99.5% of the country, becoming the top 0.005% on the national 2023 savings list. Keep up the good work, there are only 7 million people ahead of you.

chunks.zh: 亲，你才 25 ！
chunks.en: Honey, you are only 25!

chunks.zh: 25 的时候我月薪 3000
chunks.en: When I was 25, my monthly salary was 3000.

chunks.zh: @GPT9 当然不是，我是封城解封之后第三天润走的。https://springwood.me
chunks.en: @GPT9 Of course not, I left on the third day after the lockdown was lifted. https://springwood.me

chunks.zh: 你很年轻。我 25 岁的时候还是臭打游戏的，现在虽然也混得不算好，但至少背 30 年房贷了。哎，这样看来，还是你更自由一些。我其实想说：因为你没有被套住，所以你还是能够起身去别的地方转转，去看看的。谁说你在哪里工作，就一定未来就要绑定在哪个地方呢？
chunks.en: You are very young. When I was 25, I was still just playing games all the time. Although I'm not doing great now, at least I have a 30-year mortgage. Sigh, it seems you are more free. What I really want to say is: because you are not trapped, you can still get up and go to other places for a change of scenery and see the world. Who says that where you work now you must be tied to that place in the future?

chunks.zh: 青山湖科技园那边房子都 100 出头了，首付二三十万就能上车，甚至可以做 0 首付。车子迪子 798 和五菱星光 998 ，免息贷款。大胆点马上就可以有房有车了🐶
chunks.en: Houses in the Qingshan Lake Science and Technology Park are just over 1 million, and a down payment of 200,000 to 300,000 RMB is enough to get started, or even a 0 down payment. Cars like the BYD 798 and Wuling Starlight 998 have interest-free loans. Be bold and you can have a house and a car soon.🐶

chunks.zh: 以后工资会涨的，以后你一年存的钱是现在的好几倍。先不用管那么沉重的事，好好享受生活。攒钱可以交给三五年后的自己，现在的你就多享受就好了。谈个恋爱，去旅游，多接触不同的事物。
chunks.en: Your salary will increase in the future, and the amount of money you save in a year will be many times more than now. Don't worry about such heavy things for now, and enjoy life. You can leave the saving to your future self in three to five years, and now you should just enjoy yourself. Date, travel, and experience different things.

chunks.zh: 想开点，2000 年杭州这地方经济远不如沿海的宁波、温州。1860 年 2 次杭州战役，杭州城人口从六十万锐减到七万。605 年，鲜卑征服者皇帝征用 200 万人/月，开凿运河，把经济掠夺的管道，铺设到杭嘉湖平原。正如鲜卑皇帝的爸爸开创科举，把人才掠夺的管道，铺设到征服的土地。一切皆有可能，多积累技能、客户、金钱，人生并不一定跟一座城市绑定。
chunks.en: Think positively, in 2000, the economy of Hangzhou was far inferior to Ningbo and Wenzhou on the coast. In 1860, during the two battles of Hangzhou, the population of Hangzhou city plummeted from 600,000 to 70,000. In 605, the Xianbei conqueror emperor conscripted 2 million people per month to dig the canal, laying the pipeline for economic plundering to the Hangjiahu Plain. Just as the Xianbei emperor's father created the imperial examination system, laying the pipeline for talent plundering to the conquered land. Everything is possible, accumulate more skills, customers, and money, life is not necessarily tied to one city.

chunks.zh: 你还年轻，现在房价也在下跌，有什么担心的啊。。。 我们当初没赶上 15 年那波的才是真担心，你这个情况安心攒几年前，房价几年内大跌不大跌说不清，但是肯定不会大涨的，25 岁这种黄金发展期，几年后你的人生跟现在有可能完全不一样，做你该做的事情吧。真的杭州买不起你去长沙，一直稳稳的几千块钱总是买得起的
chunks.en: You are still young, and now house prices are also falling, what are you worried about... We were really worried when we missed the wave in 2015. With your situation, save money steadily for a few years. It's hard to say whether house prices will fall sharply in the next few years, but they definitely won't rise sharply. At 25, this golden development period, your life may be completely different in a few years, do what you should do. If you really can't afford to buy in Hangzhou, go to Changsha, you can always afford a few thousand RMB there.

chunks.zh: 上知乎搜一下“为什么年轻人都不愿意买房了？”还有另外一个问题，大概是在 2018 年问没买房感觉被同龄人甩开了一个身位怎么办——现在这个问题下回答基本都反转了。上一个时代落幕了，你还在问买不起房，不是应该庆幸家里没掏空 6 个钱包给你强上 30 年房贷吗？
chunks.en: Search on Zhihu for 'Why are young people unwilling to buy houses?' There is also another question, probably asked in 2018, asking what to do if you feel that you have been left behind by your peers because you didn't buy a house - the answers to this question have basically reversed now. The last era has ended, and you are still asking if you can't afford a house, shouldn't you be glad that your family didn't empty six wallets to force you into a 30-year mortgage?

chunks.zh: 还在想着买房呢，3000 块钱租一个全新小两居，住个 3 年换下一套，0 风险，永远住新房，不香吗？
chunks.en: Still thinking about buying a house? Rent a brand new small two-bedroom apartment for 3000 yuan, live in it for 3 years and change to the next one, 0 risk, always living in a new house, isn't that great?

chunks.zh: @HiCode 我一直觉得中国房地产就是丈母娘经济学，和时代落幕没啥关系。不结婚最牛，想结婚的话，还得乖乖低头掏腰包买婚房。
chunks.en: @HiCode I have always felt that Chinese real estate is mother-in-law economics, and has nothing to do with the end of an era. Not getting married is the best, if you want to get married, you have to obediently lower your head and pay for a wedding house.

chunks.zh: 25 岁靠家里出了首付，然后一直在当房奴，房贷差不多占了半个月工资，剩下的钱存了一两年然后搞装修搞完了，又存了一两年然后搞商转公搞完了
chunks.en: At 25, my family paid the down payment, and then I have been a slave to the mortgage. The mortgage almost accounts for half a month's salary. I saved the remaining money for a year or two and then finished the decoration. I saved for another year or two and then finished the commercial-to-public conversion.

chunks.zh: 不是当前流行不结婚、不买房、不生孩子不消费吗？迷茫哪儿来的
chunks.en: Isn't the current trend not getting married, not buying a house, not having children, and not consuming? Where does the confusion come from?

chunks.zh: 远离房赌毒☠️
chunks.en: Stay away from houses, gambling, and drugs ☠️

chunks.zh: 现在的版本不是已经更新到专注于自我实现了吗？早点放弃老版本的打法
chunks.en: Hasn't the current version been updated to focus on self-realization? Give up the old game plan earlier.

chunks.zh: 入赘当萧山女婿
chunks.en: Become a son-in-law in Xiaoshan (by marrying into a Xiaoshan family).
